name: Delivery Ballon
description:
Have fun delivering packages with your balloon.

This is my first game here.
With the arrival of the pandemic, I found myself without a fixed job. So I studied  game development with Game Maker Studio and here is my first creation.

I will be very grateful if you can buy the game to give me the support and encouragement to keep going. To improve my knowledge and create new and better games.

 Thank you!

Delivery Ballon

6 languages available through the game menu:
English, Portuguese, Russian, Mandarin, Spanish and German.

The commands are very simple.

IN THE MENU:

Use the UP or DOWN arrows to navigate the menu and ENTER to choose.
Use the LEFT or RIGHT arrows to change the language.

IN-GAME:

RIGHT ARROW - Walk right.
LEFT ARROW - Walk left.
SPACE - Jump.

UP ARROW - The balloon goes up.
DOWN ARROW - The balloon goes down.
CTRL - Patch the punctured balloon.

ALT + ENTER - Change between modes window and fullscreen.
ALT - Turn the music on and off.
ESC - Menu.
